newsitem.title: USA: Clinton calls Dole to tell him of Iraq strike.
newsitem.headline: Clinton calls Dole to tell him of Iraq strike.

text.p: President Clinton Tuesday telephoned Republican rival Bob Dole, a critic of his dealings with Iraqi leader Saddam Hussein, and told him about the decision to launch a missile attack on targets in Iraq.
"The president thought it was a very good call," White House Press Secretary Mike McCurry said, declining to elaborate on the conversation.
